title: My Google Pixel 3XL phone camera focus function stopped working. I tried suggestions from Google.
content:
My Google Pixel 3 XL phone camera focus function stopped working so my photos are out of focus. It's stuck at one close shot focus. The rest of the distance shoots are all blurred.

I've tried some suggestions from Google but nothing is working.  This is a coon problem with Google Pixel cameras. Any ideas?
